docs.snippet: SINCE it seems to be ordained by the stars that journalists of this generation shall write books, especially those who have already written one successful book, it is hardly a surprise to learn that Negley Farson is now the author of "Transgressor in...
docs.lead_paragraph: SINCE it seems to be ordained by the stars that journalists of this generation shall write books, especially those who have already written one successful book, it is hardly a surprise to learn that Negley Farson is now the author of "Transgressor in the Tropics.'*

docs.snippet: Three more nations signed up yesterday for participation in the New' York World's Fair of 1939. The total is now sixty-two nations and the League of Nations, according to Grover A. Whalen, president of the Fair Corporation.

docs.snippet: William Dawson, newly appointed United States Minister to Uruguay, yesterday praised Uruguay as "having much in common with the United States in culture, politically and in tradition" in an informal address at a luncheon given in his honor by the...
docs.lead_paragraph: William Dawson, newly appointed United States Minister to Uruguay, yesterday praised Uruguay as "having much in common with the United States in culture, politically and in tradition" in an informal address at a luncheon given in his honor by the Pan-American Society at the India House, 1 Hanover Square.
